Name: Prins Heerlijk
Review Text: Excellent food! Awesome menu options, good coffee and great views of the canal... would highly recommend for a crafty breakfast or lunch spot... we had Dutch eggs (without ham) and they were delicious!

Name: Prins Heerlijk
Review Text: The restaurant is close to the train station, that is the only good thing it has. The food was below average and portions were small. The prices are way too high for the quality and size delivered. Staff were not friendly either, which …

Name: Prins Heerlijk
Review Text: Very good! Good food, good atmosphere, nice service. Good if you are waiting for your train, since it’s so close to Amsterdam Centraal. Crispy croissant, good coffee.

Name: Prins Heerlijk
Review Text: Good food for the price, but small venue. If you are looking for a good meal at a reasonable price, this is the place to go. If you are in a group it's not so great. The restaurant is very small. So you will need to be open to eating …

Name: Prins Heerlijk
Review Text: I loved this restaurant. We went to Amsterdam on a couple's weekend getaway and ate breakfast the here three days in a row. The restaurant is small, so I recommend it for small groups only. However, we had minimal wait for the two of us …

Name: Prins Heerlijk
Review Text:
If you are in Amsterdam you have to visit this place !

Lovely Service …

Name: Prins Heerlijk
Review Text: First issue was poor service. We sat around fairly long until we figured we may order at the counter. Which wasn't necessary, they simply didn't notice us apparently. Then after we ordered and got our coffee we were asked whether we would …

Name: Prins Heerlijk
Review Text: Fantastic little cafe with great staff.  My family and I (5 in total) had breakfast here 3 days whilst on a recent vacation.  Delicious food at great prices and great portions.  Fantastic quick friendly service from the staff also.

Name: Prins Heerlijk
Review Text: The Pancackes weren’t good and not fresh. The stuff wasn‘t friendly and bearly did their job:(

Name: Prins Heerlijk
Review Text: Food was alright, nice but a bit plain. There was an extra fee of 2% when paying with card that wasn't advertised nor stated on the receipt, bad practice in my opinion. I wasn't that friendly viewed when I informed the staff of my opinion. Alright, but there are much better places like this in Amsterdam.

Name: Prins Heerlijk
Review Text: amazing breakfast, you MUST try it, opens very early across the street from centraal amsterdam stop, best eggs and coffee I had in Amsterdam, very friendly and fast staff, almost always full. must try their signature chicken sandwich

Name: Prins Heerlijk
Review Text: Best coffee in Amsterdam! The service was great! I would have eaten here everyday had I discovered it earlier! Obssessed with the poffertjes made better with strawberry and nutella! The english breakfast was great too and so was the salmon!

Name: Prins Heerlijk
Review Text: I am a student and I don't even eat such a mediocre breakfast. Coffee is also quite expensive.

Name: Prins Heerlijk
Review Text: You should never eat a burger in this place, it tastes horribly, truly. Worse than McDonald's and stuff like that. Really low quality ingredients, (low quantity also: one small piece of lettuce and tiny tomato slice). Never ever again. And …

Name: Prins Heerlijk
Review Text: Small Café where you can get Breakfast and All-Day Snacks such as Toasties, Pancakes and Burgers. Their coffee was great and the ladies working behind the counter did a great job when it comes to service.

Name: Prins Heerlijk
Review Text: Very chilled environment. Kept the customers very cosy and warm despite the terrible weather outside. Food was also very lovely and prices don’t hurt your purse strings.

Name: Prins Heerlijk
Review Text: Absolutely love this place, really small but very friendly staff and super tasty food, it's just about 5 minutes by walk from centraal station.

Name: Prins Heerlijk
Review Text: Great food, delicious hot drinks and good service. However, I was disappointed by the dessert, having a dislike for nuts, the chocolate was more nuts than chocolate and thus not really appreciated.

Name: Prins Heerlijk
Review Text:
Good for a full english breakfast.
Portion is good for the price.
Small restaurant, it's best to sit outside, when the weather is nice.

Name: Prins Heerlijk
Review Text:
We‘ve had breakfast at the „Prins Heerlijk“.
The service was very kind and the food delicious. Also a nice athmosphere.
I recommend the Prins Heerlijk!

Name: Prins Heerlijk
Review Text: Like other reviews it should be known that this place is very cozy. I still gave it 5 stars. The staff was incredibly friendly, the service was quick, the food was great, and the prices were reasonable. This picture was not the full menu.

Name: Prins Heerlijk
Review Text: Actually went there last year. A nice little place for breakfast, food is great.

Name: Prins Heerlijk
Review Text: Tasty and very polite staff, especially Paulina ! So kind ! Had to leave a comment !

Name: Prins Heerlijk
Review Text: Really wonderful service and food, highly recommend and not as busy as Amsterdam pancakes.

Name: Prins Heerlijk
Review Text: Clicks taken during a canal cruise tour at Amsterdam central !!! 12 Euros per head, worth the money

Name: Prins Heerlijk
Review Text: Delicious! But this is not what traditional english Breakfast looks like and the bacon is too salty.

Name: Prins Heerlijk
Review Text: Delicious breakfast, they fulfill every special request. We had breakfast there 3 days in a row because we couldn’t find a better place 😊 I absolutely recommend the pancakes!

Name: Prins Heerlijk
Review Text: We had breakfast here last year, all was perfectly fine and we enjoyed an omelette. …

Name: Prins Heerlijk
Review Text: Good breakfasts served by friendly waitresses. The pancakes are delicious in here.

Name: Prins Heerlijk
Review Text: Very friendly staff, even chased out a wasp for us! Good food, good price and an amazing view

Name: Prins Heerlijk
Review Text: Has the most amazing uitsmijter (ham, eggs, cheese on toast). Sometimes I have flashbacks to that most amazing breakfast and want to jump on the train and travel the 5 hours just so I can walk down from the train station to Prins Heerlijk and experience it again. Whenever I go to Amsterdam it’s a must visit place if you can get a seat.

Name: Prins Heerlijk
Review Text:
Very good breakfast.
And it is served all day long.
Don't forget to get the pancakes!
They're great.

Name: Prins Heerlijk
Review Text: Great place to take a breakfast with your friends, food great and cosy mood !

Name: Prins Heerlijk
Review Text: Amazing breakfest at a fair price and great location! The Dutch pancakes are delicious 😋

Name: Prins Heerlijk
Review Text: This place is amazing! The food here is delicious! And the stuff very polite and helpful!

Name: Prins Heerlijk
Review Text: Good apple pie, had outdoor seating when we were visiting.

Name: Prins Heerlijk
Review Text: Prompt service. Good food. Visited for the second time. Highly recommended

Name: Prins Heerlijk
Review Text: The breakfast tasted like something I would make in a hurry in the mornings while I am late to work. Not at all flavourful and not worth it.

Name: Prins Heerlijk
Review Text: Great, cozy and warm place. Awesome for gluten free people. Would definitely come back!

Name: Prins Heerlijk
Review Text: Nice little place to eat and drink. I had the vegan humus sandwich and it was delicious.

Name: Prins Heerlijk
Review Text: Gorgeous pancakes, great coffee and very friendly service. It's a small cafe that has a very warm and cozy feel to it.

Name: Prins Heerlijk
Review Text: Good food, good atmosphere, EXCELLENT MUSIC.

Name: Prins Heerlijk
Review Text: Food is so good, and flat white is awesome!

Name: Prins Heerlijk
Review Text: Enjoyed my breakfast at this place! Tasty omelettes, good vibes and friendly staff

Name: Prins Heerlijk
Review Text: Really great coffee and breakfast! I ordered the salmon and eggs and a cappuccino. As with all the restaurants near city center, a bit pricey. To be expected, and the portions are good for the price. My only warning is that it's best to eat …

Name: Prins Heerlijk
Review Text: Good place to go for full English brekkie although I'm not sure lettuce belongs on the plate. Food fresh and tasty, service v good

Name: Prins Heerlijk
Review Text: Absolutely loved this place. There isn’t a lot of seating, but if you manage to snag a spot you’ll be treated to great service, great food, and a lovely view of the streets of Amsterdam. The staff here was so nice and friendly, and everyone …

Name: Prins Heerlijk
Review Text: Good range of products , student discount available, cozy space

Name: Prins Heerlijk
Review Text: When you order an Fanta orange, you get an orange juice, and when you order a tuna sandwich you get a boring bread without salat

Name: Prins Heerlijk
Review Text: What a great find - we were able to try authentic Dutch food here at this little gem. The poffertjes were my favourite - tried it the original way with powdered sugar. Also enjoyed both the pancakes and croissant. The staff were also very nice and welcoming. Overall, I would return.

Name: Prins Heerlijk
Review Text: Very nice and small place. Great service and a great variety. Recommend to start the day here with a breakfast

Name: Prins Heerlijk
Review Text: Lovely little restaurant perfect for brunch

Name: Prins Heerlijk
Review Text: Really nice breakfast, very attentive service. A must visit!!

Name: Prins Heerlijk
Review Text: If someone wants to send me the recipe for these Dutch pancakes I’ll marry your son

Name: Prins Heerlijk
Review Text: Lovely staff. Get the traditional pancake and the mini pancakes.

Name: Prins Heerlijk
Review Text: Dutch style breakfast was amazing and great coffee too. Always first stop when arriving in Amsterdam.

Name: Prins Heerlijk
Review Text: Great breakfast! Despite the small size we still managed to snag a table. Great food, would go again. The English Breakfast was a great deal and pretty tasty. If you ask for water they bring bottles you have to buy just an FYI.

Name: Prins Heerlijk
Review Text: Me and my boyfriend came here for breakfast. He got full English and I got veggie omelette without mushrooms. My omelette was very tasty, local cheese was a good add-on. …

Name: Prins Heerlijk
Review Text: A tiny, cornered, brunch restaurant, with bright smiling waiters ! The place is indeed tiny but so cosy, the food is excellent, the service is fast and the plates are biiiig ! If you are looking for a brunch in Amsterdam : THIS IS THE PLACE !

Name: Prins Heerlijk
Review Text:
Very friendly and accommodating service and great food too!

This is not an upscale establishment with fancy elaborate menus and complicated …

Name: Prins Heerlijk
Review Text:
Good breakfast place ! Near the central station! Staff was friendly !
The place is a bit small so you have to see where you get place to sit.
we ordered the standard english breakfast with replacement of bacon for chicken …

Name: Prins Heerlijk
Review Text: Very good breakfest,nice and friendly staff.

Name: Prins Heerlijk
Review Text: Best coffee in the Dam,,,,,seriously nice staff,huge brekkie,see ye again in 6 weeks 😎😎

Name: Prins Heerlijk
Review Text: Perfect brunch!!! Delicious thank you x

Name: Prins Heerlijk
Review Text: A very nice blond water, very helpfull and carismatic.

Name: Prins Heerlijk
Review Text: Small place but quite chill for the area it’s in. Friendly staff but nothing exceptional. As a vegan, it was quite bad food and both of us got sick after eating there so it says it all about the quality of the ingredients or how it’s cooked.

Name: Prins Heerlijk
Review Text: Ordered a cappuchino, paid a cappuchino, got a latte, and no options to put some cocoa on my coffe, weird... but the latte was good

Name: Prins Heerlijk
Review Text: I loved this place! Such a gem and the food was excellent! It is small but the warmth of the staff and the quality of the food served offsets this. I actually ended up here because another restaurant google recommended was closed and I was …

Name: Prins Heerlijk
Review Text: Fantastic lunch we had here.  Pulled pork and meatlovers we both loved it. Atmosphere is very relaxing and staff were very friendly. Highly recommend this place. The American banana pancakes were amazing. Thank u

Name: Prins Heerlijk
Review Text: The proffertjes were good and the staff was friendly

Name: Prins Heerlijk
Review Text: Great food for the price. I wanted eggs and my wife wanted pancakes but most places I found only served one or the other while also carrying high marks to begin with but this place carried everything breakfast related and it was delicious. …

Name: Prins Heerlijk
Review Text: Very nice and tasty breakfast, big portions

Name: Prins Heerlijk
Review Text: Some of the best food in town. Hands down. Secret Menu is still a secret unless you know DJ Brown13.

Name: Prins Heerlijk
Review Text: Worst possible behaviour. They should do a basic course on how to serve the customers!

Name: Prins Heerlijk
Review Text: Amazing cafe. Good food, personable staff, Giselle was absolutely wonderful even though we broke a plate! Serves breakfast all day which is great, and also isn't overpriced! Definitely very small, not for big groups.

Name: Prins Heerlijk
Review Text: Delicious food for a great value in central Amsterdam.

Name: Prins Heerlijk
Review Text: Amazing. Got the veggie omelette and a flat white. A small space inside so be prepared to sit outside if needed. I loved the street around it. A nice little breakfast spot.

Name: Prins Heerlijk
Review Text: Tasty food and fast service. It's a really small cafe with limited seating so had to wait around 15mins for a table but worth it. Perfect for breakfast!

Name: Prins Heerlijk
Review Text: Not the best place to eat, poor sandwiches, wrong orders, you can find better for sure.

Name: Prins Heerlijk
Review Text: Came here after omelegg (right around the corner) had closed after our delayed train. Burgers were excellent, quick, and reasonably priced. Good coffee and nice staff. Considering how close it is to the station it is certainly worth popping by for a quick meal between trains or on your way out of Amsterdam.

Name: Prins Heerlijk
Review Text: Tried smoked salmon with egg. The food was yum. The hostess was very congenial. No meal is complete without the pancakes with butter. Lovely outdoor seating.

Name: Prins Heerlijk
Review Text: Owner was very nice and the poffertjes were great! Only the price was a little too high for our taste, although quite normal for where the little (very limited seatings) cafe is situated.

Name: Prins Heerlijk
Review Text:
Nice place for a burger/sandwich. I was there for dinner, think it would be better for lunch tho. I had the big burger, it was really tasty.
The salmon sandwich also looked really nice. Great location and really friendly staff. Recommend!

Name: Prins Heerlijk
Review Text: Great place,  nice and cosy. Stuff is super friendly, service is quick. Food was great, we had brunch here and all was really delicious! Thank you :)

Name: Prins Heerlijk
Review Text: Friendly staff, decent Dutch and English breakfast, good coffee. Two things - utensils could be cleaner and POS terminal is bolted to counter,  so you can pay with your card only after walking up to it.

Name: Prins Heerlijk
Review Text: Poor quality and service , avoid breakfast pancake at all cost

Name: Prins Heerlijk
Review Text: Located right outside the central station. Stopped by for lunch before leaving from the central station. Ordered the bigburger. Tasted pretty good. Had like big mac sauce on the burger. Service was nice. No bathroom available. Free wifi. Extra 2% for using credit cards.

Name: Prins Heerlijk
Review Text: A good breakfast cafe a stone throw's away from central station. This small cafe seems to be very popular as it serves all kind of food. You can get omelette, dutch pancake or sandwiches or just humble croissant. …

Name: Prins Heerlijk
Review Text: Expensive and small portions. €7 for a small portion of yoghurt with barely a handful of granola. €3.70 for a coffee. Service wasn't great either. The food came out quickly, though.

Name: Prins Heerlijk
Review Text: The place looks nice, prices are a bit high. The problem was when I came, it took 10 minutes before someone take my order. And during all my stay, the workers were screaming to each other and the place was full of empty boxes on the ground... I hope they can fix their service.

Name: Prins Heerlijk
Review Text: Worst price/value ratio, the sandwiches were a dry burger bun with the toppings on it

Name: Prins Heerlijk
Review Text: Service is fast, seem friendly, but not as friendly..they ask money even for hot water xD water should be free imho and they open earlier than other cafes in the area(7:30) If you can wait until 8 I’d recommend going somewhere else for breakfast.

Name: Prins Heerlijk
Review Text:
Nice and cozy atmosphere, friendly waitress who has fun on his work.
Delicious and payable food, secret-tipp: the dutch pancake with banana and chocolate ;)

Name: Prins Heerlijk
Review Text: Great place to have breakfast, just very close to the central station. Wide menu, very friendly staff, who were making sure to keep and eye on everyone even when it was busy.

Name: Prins Heerlijk
Review Text: Brilliantly tasty food. Everything we tasted here was top notch. Small cute place right in the heart of the city with everything at a walking distance from.

Name: Prins Heerlijk
Review Text: Ordered a pulled pork burger and my partner ordered a big burger. Both were good but it seems then pulled pork burger is just the big burger with an extra item. …

Name: Prins Heerlijk
Review Text: Very tasty! Ate here with my friends for over a week and it's all fresh and delicious. Although some meals are kinda weird especially the salads.

Name: Prins Heerlijk
Review Text: The place is very comfortable and the food us delicious! We could feel a warm and joyful atmosphere created by the workers. Everything was perfect!

Name: Prins Heerlijk
Review Text: It was the blandest food i have ever gotten, and the ingredients for the salad were not ripe. Additionally, the food arrived after 40 minutes of waiting, when the restaurant was barely visited. Cannot recommend at all.

Name: Prins Heerlijk
Review Text: Great lil restaurant. We sat outside in the mid morning sunshine. Service was quick and kind. Huge serving of omelette. Awesome hot chocolate.

Name: Prins Heerlijk
Review Text: Friendly staff. Decent breakfast. (Maple syrup is not the same as in the U.S if you want pancakes lol)

Name: Prins Heerlijk
Review Text: The dutch style eggs were good, dutch crepe was not that much food (only a thin crepe) for the money we paid. Quick and friendly service.

Name: Prins Heerlijk
Review Text: I think I got type 2 diabetes by eating a Price Pancake, but it was ABSOLUTELY delicious. …

Name: Prins Heerlijk
Review Text:
Variety of sandwiches, burgers and pastries in addition to coffee.

Great pricing and sufficient portions, burgers and fries available all day. Coffee and pastries available from about €5 and sandwiches and burgers from about €7.5

Name: Prins Heerlijk
Review Text: Service OK, setting nice but portion sizes and food quality are poor, the full English had 2 cocktail sausages, the bacon was mostly fat and the toast was rock solid and cold

Name: Prins Heerlijk
Review Text: The food is average quality, but burgers don't come with any sides. They won't let customers use their toilet, drink tap water, or pay with credit.

Name: Prins Heerlijk
Review Text: Great service and a wonderful English breakfast! The cafe is also really pretty and a great place to grab a bite before a journey!

Name: Prins Heerlijk
Review Text: Homecooked style food. Very warm and friendly service. Decent food. Good value for money. Quick and easy !

Name: Prins Heerlijk
Review Text: Truly well-made food, incredible taste and really great prices. Had nice music and the staff was friendly.

Name: Prins Heerlijk
Review Text: Very tasty authentic Dutch breakfast! Cappuccino was also very nice. All of that at a reasonable price

Name: Prins Heerlijk
Review Text: Very small place, but delicious breakfast!  I had the mini pancakes with butter and sugar with the fruit on the side - fabulous!!!

Name: Prins Heerlijk
Review Text: Tasty! Absolutely tiny inside though. 50/50 chance of having to sit outside to eat. In my humble opinion one of the best spots in Amsterdam to people watch.

Name: Prins Heerlijk
Review Text: Amazing, small restaurant with very friendly staff, good food and big portions for the price.

Name: Prins Heerlijk
Review Text: I was very sick after eating there. I had huge stomack hack during many days and my girlfriend pucked. The worst food of amsterdam. Don t go in this place

Name: Prins Heerlijk
Review Text: Small, intimate and the best sandwich. It was delicious. you might have to wait outside but its worth it. The staff are so friendly

Name: Prins Heerlijk
Review Text: It looks plain from the outside but they make great meals. Very friendly atmosphere as well. Love it.

Name: Prins Heerlijk
Review Text: We ate here on our trip to Amsterdam regularly for breakfast and once for lunch. Love place, great food and service

Name: Prins Heerlijk
Review Text: Fantastic in heart of de Wallen. Best location in amsterdam.

Name: Prins Heerlijk
Review Text: Good was great.. friendly and helpful staff. We're quick to prepare my vegetarian meal.

Name: Prins Heerlijk
Review Text: Very tedious. Only exciting part was when our boat Captain hot the boat against the side of the canal 4 times in a row. The day improved when the 50 minute tour ended!

Name: Prins Heerlijk
Review Text: Excellent food, service, and very relaxing homely atmosphere. Highly recommend their prince burger and sweet potato fries.

Name: Prins Heerlijk
Review Text:
Interesting selection of pancakes (bacon/cheese!) and sandwiches.

Name: Prins Heerlijk

Name: Prins Heerlijk

Name: Prins Heerlijk

Name: Prins Heerlijk

Name: Prins Heerlijk

Name: Prins Heerlijk

Name: Prins Heerlijk

Name: Prins Heerlijk

Name: Prins Heerlijk

Name: Prins Heerlijk
Review Text: Execellent service from the staff, the food is the best over the amsterdam center.....if you want a fast service and delicious you should directly stop here.

Name: Prins Heerlijk
Review Text: A good place to have a coffee or sandwich. You can even have a Latte Macchiato there, which is actually not easy to find in the Netherlands.

Review Text: Pancakes were fantastic and had great service! Overall great experience

Name: Prins Heerlijk
Review Text: Small, cramped space with good food, reasonable coffee, and friendly service.  Good for a quick bite.

Name: Prins Heerlijk

Name: Prins Heerlijk
Review Text: Well it was I'lly before. Best breakfast we had. Open air.. good food. Tasty

Name: Prins Heerlijk
